Moderately Armoured

You gain Armour Proficiency with Medium Armour and shields, and your Strength or Dexterity increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Moderately Armoured is a Feats in Baldur's Gate 3. Feats are special talents or expertises that provide special capabilities to characters. At certain levels, your character will get to choose between an Ability Score Improvement Feature or a Feat.

BG3 Moderately Armoured Information

You gain Armour Proficiency with Medium Armour and shields, and your Strength or Dexterity increases by 1, to a maximum of 20. Class Features: Medium Armour Proficiency Shield Proficiency

Medium Armour Proficiency Shield Proficiency

How to unlock Moderately Armoured IN BG3

You'll need to fulfill the following requirements to unlock Moderately Armoured

Light Armor Proficiency All Classes at Level 4

BG3 Moderately Armoured Tips & Notes

Moderately Armored provides medium armor and shield proficiency, along with an increase to Strength or Dexterity. It can benefit characters who lack these proficiencies, like Bards, Warlocks, or Rogues. Notes & Tips go here
